segments.text: What a sneaky little scene in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are after the cookies, boy on the stool and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching right in, got a plate to hold them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's all excited, hand out for hers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, Mom's drying dishes, totally clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's forming, and her foot's in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks shaky, but they're having fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden through the window is pretty, adds to the homey feel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how innocent their mischief is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, everything seems so normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope they get their cookies without a fuss.
segments.speaker: PAR
